text: Guillermo Squella (18 March 1923 - 11 December 2010) was a Chilean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Chilean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Chile Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Chile Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1951 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 1967 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Guillermo Squella
